Package com.csaba79coder.bestprotocol.model.government.persistence

Interface GovernmentTranslationRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<GovernmentTranslation,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<GovernmentTranslation,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<GovernmentTranslation,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<GovernmentTranslation,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<GovernmentTranslation,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<GovernmentTranslation>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<GovernmentTranslation,Long>
@Repository public interface GovernmentTranslationRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<GovernmentTranslation,Long>
Spring Data JPA repository for the GovernmentTranslation entity.

  • Method Details

    • findGovernmentTranslationByLanguageShortNameAndGovernmentId

      List<GovernmentTranslation> findGovernmentTranslationByLanguageShortNameAndGovernmentId(String languageShortName, Long governmentId)
      Finds all GovernmentTranslations with the given language short name and government ID.
      Parameters:
      languageShortName - the language short name to search for
      governmentId - the ID of the government to search for
      Returns:
      a list of matching government translations, or an empty list if none found

    • findGovernmentTranslationByLanguageShortName

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      a list of matching government translations, or an empty list if none found

    • findGovernmentByNameContainsIgnoreCase

      Optional<GovernmentTranslation> findGovernmentByNameContainsIgnoreCase(String name)
      Finds the GovernmentTranslation with a name containing the given string (case-insensitive).
      Parameters:
      name - the string to search for
      Returns:
      an optional containing the matching government translation, or an empty optional if none found

      Finds the GovernmentTranslation with the given ID.
      Parameters:

      GovernmentTranslation findByGovernmentIdAndLanguageShortName(Long governmentId, String languageShortName)
      Finds the GovernmentTranslation with the given government ID and language short name.
      Parameters:
      governmentId - the ID of the government to search for
      languageShortName - the language short name to search for
      Returns:
      the matching government translation, or null if none found
